tool_description: Generates personalized review invitations with paper details, deadlines, and customized messaging based on reviewer profiles and preferences.

reviewer_ids.description: List of reviewer identifiers to invite

paper_title.description: Title of the paper for review

paper_abstract.description: Abstract of the paper for review

journal_name.description: Name of the journal or venue

invitation_tone.description: Tone of invitation: formal, friendly, concise

compensation_info.description: Information about reviewer compensation or recognition

special_instructions.description: Any special review instructions or requirements

personalization_level.description: Level of personalization: high, medium, low

error_messages: Invalid deadline dates: review_deadline and response_deadline must be valid future dates.
Missing required content: paper_title, paper_abstract, and journal_name cannot be empty.
Invalid tone or personalization: Use valid options for invitation_tone [formal, friendly, concise] and personalization_level [high, medium, low].
Too many invitations: Limit to 20 reviewers per batch for personalization quality.
Invalid reviewer IDs: Some provided reviewer identifiers do not exist.
usage: Provide reviewer_ids, paper_title, paper_abstract, review_deadline, and journal_name. Customize with invitation_tone, compensation_info, special_instructions, personalization_level, and response_deadline as needed.

invitation_texts.description: Generated invitation messages for each reviewer

invitation_subjects.description: Email subject lines for each invitation

personalization_notes.description: Notes on personalization elements used for each reviewer

generation_summary.description: Summary of invitation generation process and recommendations
